mapper.select: SELECT h_uid "uid", h_start startTime, h_end endTime, emp_uid "empuid" FROM HOLIDAY WHERE emp_uid = #{param1}

SELECT e.EMP_UID "uid", category.W_START "start", category.stat "status" FROM EMPLOYEES e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.DEP_UID = d.dep_uid JOIN POSITIONRANK p ON e.P_UID = p.P_UID JOIN (SELECT h.*, CASE WHEN h.endTime IS NOT NULL THEN '퇴근' WHEN h.startTime <= 900 THEN '출근' WHEN h.startTime <= 930 THEN '지각' ELSE '결근' END AS stat FROM (SELECT oh.*, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(oh.W_START , 'hh24mi')) AS startTime, to_number(TO_CHAR(oh.W_END , 'hh24mi')) AS endTime FROM OFFICE_HOUR oh ) h) category ON e.EMP_UID = category.EMP_UID WHERE e.EMP_UID = #{param1}
